votings.label: Should the NIM supply growth curve be adjusted?
votings.name: change-curve
votings.announcement: The vote on "Should Nimiq adjust the current supply curve?" will start on Friday May 8, 2020 at approximately 12:00 noon UTC.

votings.label: Which NIM supply curve do you prefer?
votings.name: rank-curves
votings.announcement: The vote on "Which NIM supply curve do you prefer?" will start on Friday May 29, 2020 at approximately 12:00 noon UTC.

votings.label: Community Funding Board Election Q4 2020
votings.name: cfb-q4-2020
votings.announcement: The Q4 2020 Community Funding Board elections will run from Monday, Nov 30 to Monday, Dec 7. To learn more about the candidates, check the link below. The three highest voted candidates will become the next community representatives.

votings.label: Community funding board election Q3 2022
votings.name: cfb-q3-2022
votings.announcement: The Q3 2022 Community Funding Board elections will run from Monday, Jul 18 to Sunday, Jul 24. To learn more about the candidates, check the link below. The three highest voted candidates will become the next community representatives.
